title: US Woman Jailed For Poisoning Boyfriend Over False $30 Million Inheritance
content: State District Judge Richard Hagar sentenced Kenoyer to 25 years in prison last Wednesday after she pleaded guilty in May.
summary: State District Judge Richard Hagar sentenced Kenoyer to 25 years in prison last Wednesday after she pleaded guilty in May.

title: 'Idea Of Giving Back To Society Dates Back To Ancient Times': M3M's Payal Kanodiya
content: The idea of giving back to society dates back to ancient times, M3M Foundation'sChairperson and TrusteePayal Kanodia said while listing the various initiatives undertaken by her organisation.
summary: The idea of giving back to society dates back to ancient times, M3M Foundation'sChairperson and TrusteePayal Kanodia said while listing the various initiatives undertaken by her organisation.

title: "Believe In Economic Policies Of This Government": Pernod Ricard India Official To NDTV
content: Pernod Ricard India has faith in the economic policies of the government led by Narendra Modi and that is why it is going ahead with its expansion and investment plans here, its top official told NDTV.
summary: Pernod Ricard India has faith in the economic policies of the government led by Narendra Modi and that is why it is going ahead with its expansion and investment plans here, its top official told NDTV.

title: No Direct Flights, Ban On Apps: Areas Hit By India-China's Strained Ties
content: India and China have reached a deal on patrolling their disputed Himalayan frontier, aiming to resolve a fouryear military standoff, Indian Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri said
summary: India and China have reached a deal on patrolling their disputed Himalayan frontier, aiming to resolve a fouryear military standoff, Indian Foreign Secretary Vikram Misri said

title: S Jaishankar Explains Why Russia Will Remain India's Strategic Partner
content: S Jaishankar today spoke about 'The India Century' at the NDTV World Summit in New Delhi. During the interaction Mr Jaishankar gave a detailed overview on India's foreign policy and how it is playing an increasingly global role.
summary: S Jaishankar today spoke about 'The India Century' at the NDTV World Summit in New Delhi. During the interaction Mr Jaishankar gave a detailed overview on India's foreign policy and how it is playing an increasingly global role.

title: Jennifer Garner, Julia Roberts - Hollywood Stars Support Kamala Harris
content: Actor Jennifer Garner had a warning for a crowd of "Moms for Harris" gathered at a tearoom in Tucson, Arizona: Be prepared to see more Hollywood stars visiting your state to talk about the November 5 election.
summary: Actor Jennifer Garner had a warning for a crowd of "Moms for Harris" gathered at a tearoom in Tucson, Arizona: Be prepared to see more Hollywood stars visiting your state to talk about the November 5 election.

title: "Have To Protect Society From AI": Sunil Bharti Mittal At NDTV World Summit
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) will be among the most important drivers of the world economy and geopolitics in times to come, Bharti Group Chairman Sunil Mittal said on Monday.
summary: Artificial Intelligence (AI) will be among the most important drivers of the world economy and geopolitics in times to come, Bharti Group Chairman Sunil Mittal said on Monday.

title: Alexei Navalny's Wife Plans Political Run After Putin Regime's Fall: Report
content: Yulia Navalnaya, the widow of late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, will return to Russia and run for political office once Vladimir Putin is no longer leader, she told the BBC in an interview aired Monday.
summary: Yulia Navalnaya, the widow of late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, will return to Russia and run for political office once Vladimir Putin is no longer leader, she told the BBC in an interview aired Monday.

title: What S Jaishankar Said On Khalistani Terrorist Pannun's Threat To Air India
content: The Indian government is "not aware" of any specific threat against Air India and its passengers - made by Khalistani terrorist Gurpatwant Pannun - External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said Monday evening at the NDTV World Summit.
summary: The Indian government is "not aware" of any specific threat against Air India and its passengers - made by Khalistani terrorist Gurpatwant Pannun - External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said Monday evening at the NDTV World Summit.

title: "Haath Milaya, Aa Gaye Wapis": S Jaishankar On Pakistan Visit For SCO Summit
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar denied meeting Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif in a personal capacity at the recently-concluded Shanghai Cooperation Organisation Summit in Islanabad.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar denied meeting Pakistan Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif in a personal capacity at the recently-concluded Shanghai Cooperation Organisation Summit in Islanabad.

title: "Russia Has Never...": S Jaishankar Spells Out Mantra In Delhi-Moscow Ties
content: Russia has never done anything to impact India's interests negatively, and there is an economic and strategic logic behind New Delhi maintaining strong ties with Moscow, External Affairs Minister Dr S Jaishankar said at the NDTV World Summit today.
summary: Russia has never done anything to impact India's interests negatively, and there is an economic and strategic logic behind New Delhi maintaining strong ties with Moscow, External Affairs Minister Dr S Jaishankar said at the NDTV World Summit today.

title: "India Will Become Leader In Semiconductor Production": Investor Mark Mobius
content: India has outperformed the US markets and emerging markets are, on average, growing at double the rate of developed economies, ace investor Mark Mobius has said.
summary: India has outperformed the US markets and emerging markets are, on average, growing at double the rate of developed economies, ace investor Mark Mobius has said.

title: 'No Other Country Deserves..': German Envoy Advocates UNSC Seat For India
content: India deserves more than any other country to have a permanent seat on the United Nations Security Council, Dr Philipp Ackermann, Ambassador of Germany to India and Bhutan, said at the NDTV World Summit.
summary: India deserves more than any other country to have a permanent seat on the United Nations Security Council, Dr Philipp Ackermann, Ambassador of Germany to India and Bhutan, said at the NDTV World Summit.

title: "Back To 2020 Patrolling": S Jaishankar To NDTV On India, China Pact
content: Indian and Chinese soldiers will be able to resume patrolling in the way they had been doing before the border face-off began in May 2020, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said today at the NDTV World Summit.
summary: Indian and Chinese soldiers will be able to resume patrolling in the way they had been doing before the border face-off began in May 2020, External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar said today at the NDTV World Summit.

title: Pakistan Empowers Parliament To Pick Supreme Court Chief Justice
content: Pakistan approved changes to the constitution on Monday, which included empowering parliament to pick the Supreme Court's chief justice, drawing criticism from opposition parties who said it was an attempt to subvert the judiciary.
summary: Pakistan approved changes to the constitution on Monday, which included empowering parliament to pick the Supreme Court's chief justice, drawing criticism from opposition parties who said it was an attempt to subvert the judiciary.

title: "Double Standards A Very Mild Word For It": S Jaishankar On Canada Stance
content: Canadians seem to have a problem with Indian diplomats trying to find out about what is happening there in relation to India, Foreign Minister S Jaishankar said today at the NDTV World Summit.
summary: Canadians seem to have a problem with Indian diplomats trying to find out about what is happening there in relation to India, Foreign Minister S Jaishankar said today at the NDTV World Summit.

title: Israeli Forces Tighten Siege In Gaza, Target Schools And Shelters
content: Israeli forces blew up homes and besieged schools and shelters for displaced people on Monday as they deepened their operations in Jabalia in the northern Gaza Strip, residents and medics said.
summary: Israeli forces blew up homes and besieged schools and shelters for displaced people on Monday as they deepened their operations in Jabalia in the northern Gaza Strip, residents and medics said.

title: Fethullah Gulen, Accused Of 2016 Coup In Turkey, Dies In Exile Aged 83
content: US-based Muslim cleric Fethullah Gulen, who was accused by Ankara of organising a failed 2016 coup, has died in exile in the United States aged 83, his movement and the Turkish government said Monday.
summary: US-based Muslim cleric Fethullah Gulen, who was accused by Ankara of organising a failed 2016 coup, has died in exile in the United States aged 83, his movement and the Turkish government said Monday.

title: NDTV World Summit 2024: How India Plans To Build Global, AI-Driven Solutions
content: India's growth in the manufacturing, healthcare and services sectors over the last decade has made it a force to reckon with.
summary: India's growth in the manufacturing, healthcare and services sectors over the last decade has made it a force to reckon with.

title: "Global South Looks To India's Leadership": Bhutan PM At NDTV World Summit
content: The Global South trusts India's leadership and Prime Minister Narendra Modi can sort out issues between Russia and Ukraine, Bhutan Prime Minister Dasho Tshering Tobgay said at NDTV World Summit today.
summary: The Global South trusts India's leadership and Prime Minister Narendra Modi can sort out issues between Russia and Ukraine, Bhutan Prime Minister Dasho Tshering Tobgay said at NDTV World Summit today.
